header_19.raw_response: Diet Coke falls somewhere in the middle of the zesty-bland spectrum. While it has a distinctive taste, it doesn't have the intense, bold flavor that some artificially flavored drinks might have. Instead, it has a more subtle, refreshing taste that is recognizable but not overly strong. The carbonation and slight sweetness give it a unique character, but it doesn't overwhelm the palate like some zesty beverages might. Therefore, I would place Diet Coke closer to the zesty end of the spectrum, but not all the way to 100, as it still has a mild taste compared to some other drinks.
